name: @microservices-suite/cart-service
description: The cart service manages the shopping cart functionality within our microservices-based platform. It provides a seamless and intuitive user experience for adding, updating, and removing items from the cart, as well as calculating totals and applying discounts. With support for guest and authenticated users, it ensures persistence and synchronization of cart data across sessions and devices. Integrating with inventory and pricing services, it maintains real-time availability and pricing information, optimizing the shopping experience and reducing cart abandonment rates. Designed for scalability and performance, it handles high volumes of concurrent requests and ensures reliability in handling complex cart operations.
author: Gilbert Andanje
